reviews.review: This game may be old but it is always a challenge

I have played this game since it was a mod for half life in beta. Almost every game you enter now there are people blatantly walling, its trash and the developer does not do anything to combat it. They know the cheats being made and do nothing to stop them. Its so wide spread that I dont have any idea how they have pro tourneys based on this pos. If you are hacking in a video game in 2021 your a sad person and have no life.
